title: Movie Browser 1
description: Basic movie App which displays upcoming movies and details of individual movies.User can also filter movies based on input.
tools: React 18, Redux Toolkit, Context Api, Jest, React Testing library(RTL), Bootstrap5, MovieDb

title: Movie Trailer
description: Movie App which displays latest upcoming movies.User can play trailer of that movies.In addition user can also search for desired movies and play it trailer

title: Movie IMDb
description: IMDb Movie app which displays review of latest trending movies.It also give indepth detail of movie

title: Movie Browser 2
description: Advanced version of Movie Basic app . App shows upcoming ,popular, latest movies and shows details of it .User can also search their desired movie & get details of it
